title: 99: Remastered: The Two Killings of Sam Cooke
itunes:title: Remastered: The Two Killings of Sam Cooke
description:
Sam Cooke was one of the most famous singers of his time. He was an icon and a civil rights revolutionary. His power made him a target. So when he was murdered at age 33, conspiracy theories abounded. Was it the FBI? Was it the mob? Who else could have benefited from such a promising life cut so short?
